backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor stub with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report containing an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining extensive OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading root div and bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation, cart, orders, filtering, favorites, hero image preference, and merged product catalog.
frontend/src/components/AddProductDialog: Dialog component allowing users to add custom products with validation for fields and image URLs.
frontend/src/components/CartView.tsx: Cart page displaying items with quantity controls, removal actions, subtotal calculation, and empty state.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutView.tsx: Checkout form collecting shipping and payment details, validating inputs, calculating subtotal, and simulating order submission.
frontend/src/components/FavoritesView.ts: Displays the user's favorited products with options to view details or remove items, and shows an empty-state message when no favorites exist.
frontend/src/components/OrderConfirmatio: Shows an order confirmation page with order ID, item list, subtotal, and a button to continue shopping.
frontend/src/components/OrderHistoryView: Renders a list of past orders with order details and items, including an empty-state view if no orders exist.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Displays detailed product information with an image gallery, like/favorite/share controls, and add-to-cart handling, with fallbacks for missing product data.
frontend/src/components/ProductImageLigh: Provides a modal lightbox for viewing product images with keyboard navigation and next/previous controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Renders a product grid with filters, search, price range inputs, and actions to view, like, favorite, share, or add products.
frontend/src/components/SportsShopHeader: Header component with navigation buttons for home, favorites, orders, and cart, showing counts and using UI icons.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and provides a seeded list of sports products with prices and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroImagePreferenc: Manages hero image selection persisted in localStorage with automatic loading and saving.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductReactions.t: Tracks likes and favorites for products using localStorage and exposes toggle and query helpers.
Handles user-added products with persistent storage, merging them with seeded products and generating unique IDs.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/orders.ts: Builds and submits order requests to the backend using cart items and customer info.
frontend/src/lib/productShare.ts: Generates shareable product links and shares them via Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
